title: What are the key Agile Ceremonies?
description: Master Agile rituals! Stack vertical word fragments to discover the essential Scrum ceremonies.

words.fact: Sprint Planning: Team meeting at the start of each sprint to define sprint goal and select backlog items. Typically 2-4 hours for a 2-week sprint.
Daily Standup: 15-minute timeboxed event where team members share what they did yesterday, plan for today, and identify blockers.
Sprint Review: Team demonstrates completed work to stakeholders, gathers feedback, and discusses what to build next. Focus on product increment.
Sprint Retrospective: Team reflects on the sprint process, identifies what went well, what needs improvement, and creates action items for the next sprint.
